prompts.promptText: Reflect on a time where you felt stressed or anxious. Write about your experience.

When we feel stressed or anxious, we often focus too much on the self and use a lot of "I" or "me" words. When reflecting on these situations, it might help to think about how others might have felt in the situation. When you find yourself in a situation where you are stressed or anxious, try to take a step back and imagine how others might have felt in the situation.
